document.full_text: a man with a knife tried to hijack an alitalia flight from paris to rome sunday night, demanding it be flown to libya, but was quickly overpowered and arrested when the plane landed, officials and witnesses said.
document.title: man overpowered trying to hijack alitalia flight
lines_and_colors: a man with a knife tried to hijack an alitalia flight from paris to rome sunday night, demanding it be flown to libya, but was quickly overpowered and arrested when the plane landed, officials and witnesses said.
